dmca.title: Abuse on your servers - IP 69.56.143.138 - PLEASE READ IMMEDIATELY - www.purefta.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Nagra Magic [mailto:satcommunicator@gmail.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2007 10:58 PM
To: abuse; Legal; Legal Response
Subject: Abuse on your servers - IP 69.56.143.138 - PLEASE READ
IMMEDIATELY - www.purefta.com


Hi, 
I would like to inform you of a website and server being hosted on your
servers or using your network
IP address 69.56.143.138 - website www.purefta.com
 
This website contains information which is in aid of satellite piracy
and is illegal. 
This information is being publicly posted using a vbulliten chat forum
and memberships are also being sold to access special features of this
website. 
 
Currently Dishnetwork and Bell Express view are investigating and
placing Anton pillar court orders on site owners and users of these
illegal websites and the content that they host. 
 
I am sure your company is aware of the risks of having both seizure and
investigations of servers and websites located in your network because
of allowing this site to be hosted with your company. 
 
I suggest an immediate suspension and removal of this website, the owner
of this web server ( scott ) also known as xploit within the purefta
website is under current investigation and is aware of the penalties
with having use your service for solicitation of illegal information and
spam messages which over 25'000 emails were sent out using your web
server today also. 
 
Please see that this site be turned off or reprimanded immediately.

Thank You
